snippet: New York’s policy on isolation is inhumane. The prison system needs clearer guidelines from the State Legislature as to when isolation can and cannot be used.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York State's misuse of punitive isolation in prisons, which lawsuit filed against state suggests is persistent problem; calls on Legislature to set clear guidelines as to when isolation can and cannot be used.
lead_paragraph: New York’s policy on isolation is inhumane. The prison system needs clearer guidelines from the State Legislature as to when isolation can and cannot be used.
